title: Elementalist Lux
body:
So she is a queen? Shouldn't have usurped the Jarvans, you destroyed Demacia.

Dun Dun..... Dun Dun.... Dun Dun... Dun Dun.. Dun Dun. Dun Dun Dun Dun Dun Dun
Malphite has evolved

~~4K~~ 5K rp for her and her stuff? I knew rito had something for that gifting disable, justification for highway robbery of idiots.

You know what, not actually sure, the release page says 4k, but people i know say the client asks for 5k, so who knows.

replies.body:
the betrayer of the noble line of jarvan.

Also I feel of all the champions, why did they give lux yet another skin? There are so many popular champions that have less skins than lux, like I would have prefered elementalist syndra with elemental energy balls (I play neither lux nor syndra so I'm not biased).

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kqXFp92R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-29T11:56:58.688+0000)
>
> the betrayer of the noble line of jarvan.
> 
> Also I feel of all the champions, why did they give lux yet another skin? There are so many popular champions that have less skins than lux, like I would have prefered elementalist syndra with elemental energy balls (I play neither lux nor syndra so I'm not biased).

You ask people about why Lux got the ultimate skin this year and more than 75% of them will proceed to downvote your question faster than the speed of light because they are all Lux fanboys/girls
I don't think it's that bad either for Lux to have more skins, Ahri has a lot of skins too, you know.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kqXFp92R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-29T11:56:58.688+0000)
>
> the betrayer of the noble line of jarvan.
> 
> Also I feel of all the champions, why did they give lux yet another skin? There are so many popular champions that have less skins than lux, like I would have prefered elementalist syndra with elemental energy balls (I play neither lux nor syndra so I'm not biased).

still funny how they advertise 4k rp for her bundle, but sell it for 5k, or so ive been told by 13 different people

The undiscounted price (which is displayed with a strikethrough) is something like 5140, but the button itself to buy says the correct 3950 (for me at least).

It is possible they do not own Lux, in which case the bundle price would be higher for them.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kqXFp92R,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-30T08:54:48.246+0000)
>
> The undiscounted price (which is displayed with a strikethrough) is something like 5140, but the button itself to buy says the correct 3950 (for me at least).
> 
> It is possible they do not own Lux, in which case the bundle price would be higher for them.

still full price release, they usually have an actual discount for the ultimate skins, which naturally come with the icons anyway.
Which is in line with the new sale schedule. We've had full price releases for a long while now. The bundle discounts the icons.
But it's still a beautiful skin nonetheless :P
